mapper.select: select con.contract_no ,con.order_cd ,cl.client_name as clnm ,cl.permit_no as clno ,cl.manager_name as clmnm ,cl.addr as claddr ,cl.det_addr as cldaddr ,cl.manager_hp as clmhp ,com.client_name as cnm ,com.permit_no as cno ,com.manager_name as cmnm ,com.addr as caddr ,com.det_addr as cdaddr ,com.manager_hp as cmhp ,con.contract_date ,con.total_price ,pd.product_name ,con.amt_price ,con.tax ,con.price ,con.product_amt from tb_contract con inner join tb_client cl on cl.client_no = con.client_no inner join tb_client com on com.client_no = 1 inner join tb_userinfo ui on ui.loginID = con.loginID inner join tb_product pd on pd.product_no = con.product_no where con.contract_no = #{contract_no}
select price ,stock from tb_product where product_no = #{product_no}
